Package commonTest

Interface IMember

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Member, Member, Member
    public interface IMember
extends java.rmi.Remote
    IMember defines the API for chat room members to receive a data transfer. There is an local IMember instance associated with each local instance of IChatroom (which, in turn, is likely associated with a mini MVC). A stub of IMember is held by the other members of the IChatroom in their instance of IChatroom, allowing them to communicate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Access method for the name of a member
      IRemoteConnection getRemoteConnection()
      This method allows Users who only have access to each others' IMember stubs to communicate at the IStaffImplRemoteConnection level, i.e.
      void receiveData​(ChatroomDataPacket<? extends IDataPacketData> dp)
      Receive a datapacket (from another member of the chat room) to this IMember and processes it.

    • Method Detail

      • receiveData

        void receiveData​(ChatroomDataPacket<? extends IDataPacketData> dp)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Receive a datapacket (from another member of the chat room) to this IMember and processes it.
        Parameters:
        dp - The datapacket to receive
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs with remote connections.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Access method for the name of a member
        Returns:
        the member's name
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs with remote connections.

      • getRemoteConnection

        IRemoteConnection getRemoteConnection()
                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method allows Users who only have access to each others' IMember stubs to communicate at the IStaffImplRemoteConnection level, i.e. communication outside any particular chatroom. This allows peers to "walk the graph".
        Returns:
        The IStaffImplRemoteConnection of the system that owns this IMember.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurs with remote connections.
